title: How to watch Apple’s March ‘Peek performance’ event on any device
content:
Apple’s “Peek performance” event is set for March 8. Expectations are for the iPhone SE 3, iPad Air 5, and new Apple Silicon Macs to be unveiled. Read on for several ways to watch Apple’s March event on any device including how to set a reminder.

more…

The post How to watch Apple’s March ‘Peek performance’ event on any device appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This detailed guide covers multiple ways to watch Apple's March event on any device, how to set a reminder, and what we're expecting.
